styles

tests.text: You should add --fcc-expected-- div elements to .penguin-head, but found --fcc-actual--.
You should give the first div a class of face, but found --fcc-actual--.
You should give the second div a class of face, but found --fcc-actual--.

description: Start the penguin's face, by adding two div elements within .penguin-head, and giving them both a class of face.
